text: Essert-sous-Champvent was a municipality in the district of Jura-Nord vaudois in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. On 1 January 2012, the former municipalities of Essert-sous-Champvent and Villars-sous-Champvent became part of the municipality called Champvent.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 21 December 2011 == References == ==Other websites== Category:2010s disestablishments in Switzerland Category:2012 disestablishments in Europe Category:Former municipalities of Vaud
title: Essert-sous-Champvent
